objects.name: Analytic 1111
objects.description: Detects abuse of AuthorizationExecuteWithPrivileges API to gain elevated privileges via user credential prompts, typically through invocation of /usr/libexec/security_authtrampoline. Detection involves correlation of API usage, binary reputation, and prompt context.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Execution of /usr/libexec/security_authtrampoline or child processes originating from non-trusted binaries triggering credential prompts

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Calls to AuthorizationExecuteWithPrivileges() observed via Apple System Logger or security_auditing tools

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: User credential prompt events without associated trusted installer package

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Allow list of trusted binaries invoking elevation prompts
Temporal correlation threshold between API call and credential prompt
Heuristic filters to determine whether a prompt context matches known legitimate installers
